description: This file defines a React-like component named NoteCard, which displays a note's details, including title, content preview, last updated time, and action buttons for editing and deleting the note. It manages internal state for delete confirmation and handles user interactions for these actions.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: A component function that renders a note with options to edit, delete, and select. It manages delete confirmation state and handles related user interactions.
